text: Aloch is a small town in Shangla District, of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province of Pakistan. It is the capital of Puran Tehsil, which is one of the divisions of the district. ==References== *Tehsils & Unions in the District of Shangla - Government of Pakistan Category:Settlements in Shangla District Category:Towns in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Aloch
